taskbody.context: Apply the following steps for installing Design Studio on your machine.

step.cmd: On CD 4 delivered with the standard packaging, look for the executable "DesignStudioTAP-[version].exe".

step.stepresult: Dialog box that introduces the install shield for Design Studio is displayed.

step.cmd: Browse for the location where you want to install Design Studio. Never upgrade Design Studio with a new installation. Always install in a new empty folder.

step.stepresult: Design Studio is installed on your machine.

step.cmd: Double-click on the DesignStudioTAP.exe to start it.
step.stepresult: Design Studio Splash screen is displayed and asks for the workspace selection.

step.cmd: Select any new empty local directory outside of the Design Studio folder installation for creating new workspace. This is the directory where the modified models will be saved.
step.info: This folder separation protects your workspace from being removed during the installation of the next version of Design Studio.

taskbody.result: You are ready to start designing models.
